LC_E.V.I.L_P6 acceptPlayerMessage: We wish to test you. Your first assignment is on the table. Take it and go.
LC_E.V.I.L_P6 completePlayerMessage: Your next assignment will be to you shortly
LC_E.V.I.L_P6 Task1: Kill 10 BEAR PMCs using an MP7 with 20 round magazines
LC_E.V.I.L_P6 Task2: Kill 10 USEC PMCs using an MP7 with 20 round magazines
LC_E.V.I.L_P6 description: Artem has sent for you again. I know I said I was ready last time but I mean it this time.
LC_E.V.I.L_P6 note: A challenge for those who dare.
